comment: After 10 episodes of breaking bad, and coming back to this, I can say, m simply loving this guy :)
They are not paying to watch this live. They are paying to be at MIT, and get a degree from MIT.
@evacuationplanb   Why? They get a degree that says 'MIT' on it and the only thing you can say is 'well, I watched a few OCW videos... '
You can get the information for free, but it's better to be in class, have the books, and get the degree =). Learning it through these videos is near impossible without a book and formula sheet.
Yes, but how does "Watched MIT 18.085 on youtube" look on your CV :-P
